Teaching Implementation

From Peragro Tempus Wiki

Teacher

Use;

  • Start; Wait 2 minutes (- 1 second per point of skill posessed, minimum 1 second)
    • If other action, end this.
  • Rand(1-100) = X
  • If X < ({Sapience *(lower (Teacher or taught skill))}-{students total experience in taught skill})
    • Then; ({Sapience *(lower (Teacher or taught skill))}-{students total experience in taught skill}) - X = Improvement.
      • if Improvement > {total Xp necessarry for next skill level}-{Xp necessarry for current skill level}
        • then Improvement = {total Xp necessarry for next skill level}-{Xp necessarry for current skill level}
      • {students total experience in taught skill} + Improvement={students total experience in taught skill}
    • Else; Skill roll fails
  • Goto Start 



skillDelay = min( 1, (120 - caster.GetSkill(skillToTeach).GetLevel()) );

if (caster.IsReady())
{
  int improvement = 0;
  int roll = rand() % 100 + 1;
  Skill* targetSkill = target.GetSkill(skillToTeach);
  int skillToUse = min(caster.GetSkill("Teacher").GetLevel(), caster.GetSkill(skillToTeach).GetLevel());
  skillToUse *= caster.GetSkill("Sapience").GetLevel();
  skillToUse -= targetSkill.GetXP();

  if (roll < skillToUse)
  {
    improvement = skillToUse - roll;
    if (improvement > (Skill::GetXPForLevel(targetSkill.GetLevel() + 1) - Skill::GetXPForLevel(targetSkill.GetLevel())))
      improvement = Skill::GetXPForLevel(targetSkill.GetLevel() + 1) - Skill::GetXPForLevel(targetSkill.GetLevel());

    // Update target xp.
    targetSkill.SetXP(improvement + targetSkill.GetXP());
  }
  else // Skill roll failed.
  {
    printf("Skill failed.");
  }
}

Example 

Bob trains Fred in 'Dodge'.

Dodge experience needed: 3, 6, 9, 12, 15, 18, 21, ...
0 -> 1 needs 3xp total
1 -> 2 needs 9xp total
2 -> 3 needs 18xp total

Bob
*Teaching skill: 7
*Dodge skill: 6
*Sapience: 12

Fred
*Dodge skill: 1 (4xp total)

Bob rolls 20

min(7, 6) => 6             // Lower of teaching and Dodge

6 * 12 = 72 - 4 = 68       // (Sapience x Skill) - xp

20 < 68                    // Roll < result

improvement = 68 - 20 = 48 // improvement = result - roll

48 < (9 - 3) => false      // improvement < TotalXPNeededForLevel(1 + 1) - TotalXPNeededForLevel(1)
improvement = (9 - 3) = 6


Fred gains 6 exp. after 113 seconds of teaching.
Fred has Dodge skill: 2 (10exp total)
